CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Hall of Fame Resort & Entertainment Company

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2626 FULTON DRIVE NW, CANTON, Ohio, 44718, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hall Of Fame Resort & Entertainment Co operates as a holding company. The firm is a sports, entertainment, and media company. It generates revenues from various streams such as sponsorship agreements, rents, cost recoveries, events, hotel operation, Hall of Fantasy League, and through the sale of media assets.

value.name: Michael A. Crawford
value.title: Chairman, President, Chief Executive Officer & CFO
